io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.entities

Enum Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Color>
      • io.elegie.luchess.core.domain.entities.Color
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Color>

    public enum Color
extends java.lang.Enum<Color>
    Color played by a player, i.e. one of WHITE or BLACK.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      BLACK
      Color Black: "B".
      WHITE
      Color White: "W".

      • invert

        public Color invert()
        Helper method, which inverts the color, in order to provide more readable algorithms.
        Returns:
        Black becomes White, and vice-versa.

      • parse

        Parameters:

        Returns:
